price: Allí tendrán frutos, y todo lo que pidan.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
